column4: Hello. I have a problem with my wifi. The network manager finds automatically my wifi but when I click on it and when I enter my password it doesn't connect. I don't have this problem in winxp and the password I use is the same in both OS.
i think i had te same problem
it's a wubi install (ubuntu installed in windows)
ok thanks I'll try it now
cool. yea im not sure why it does that... but installing netapplet seemed to do the trick for me
anyone know where i can adjust volume other than alsamixer? im getting sound right now... but very low. alsamixer is at the highest.
ok, now I've click on Wireless: wlan0 (active) but I still dont have internet connection
nt sure then... sorry... it should automatically see any wireless connections in the area
do you have a hardware switch that's set to off?
I have my wifi ON. I installed network-admin and it detects my Wifi but it doesn't want to connect to it
